Class Label

java.lang.Object
greenfoot.Actor
Label
public class Label extends greenfoot.Actor
A Label class that allows you to display a textual value on screen. A customizable Label with optional shadow and styled text. The Label is an actor, so you will need to create it, and then add it to the world in Greenfoot. If you keep a reference to the Label then you can change the text it displays.
Version:
1.2 Author: Amjad Altadmri + polished By Saiful Shaik
Author:
Amjad Altadmri and Saiful Shaik
